consumptionHasChanged - Variable in class fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2024e2.equipments.hairdryer.mil.HairDryerElectricityModel
true when the electricity consumption of the dryer has changed after executing an external event; the external event changes the value of currentState and then an internal transition will be triggered by putting through in this variable which will update the variable currentIntensity.
consumptionHasChanged - Variable in class fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2024e2.equipments.heater.mil.HeaterElectricityModel
true when the electricity consumption of the heater has changed after executing an external event; the external event changes the value of currentState and then an internal transition will be triggered by putting through in this variable which will update the variable currentIntensity.
